string.name: Using Facebook as our login system helps improve the user experience in a number of ways:

resources.string: Using Facebook as our login system helps improve the user experience in a number of ways:

string.name: 1.) It makes it super fast to sign up and create a Chatterbox profile

resources.string: 1.) It makes it super fast to sign up and create a Chatterbox profile

string.name: 2.) It allows you to see what friends you have in common with other Chatterbox users

resources.string: 2.) It allows you to see what friends you have in common with other Chatterbox users

string.name: 3.) It helps ensure that people are using their real identities
